REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2625 reute r f BC-GE-<GE>-VENTURE-WINS 04-13 0060

TEXT.TITLE: GE <GE> VENTURE WINS JET ENGINE ORDER
TEXT.BODY: CFM International, a joint venture of <SNECMA> of France and General Electric Co said it received an order for its CFM56-5 engines worth 320 mln dlrs from <GPA Airbus 320 Group Ltd, Shannon, Ireland. The company said the engines will power 25 twin-engine Airbus Industrie A320 aircraft. Reuter
